function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High estimated basic and effective reproductive numbers (R0 and Reff)","Impact":"High transmission potential, rapid spread of disease","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and behavior change interventions","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, contact tracing apps, and vaccine distribution systems","People":"General population, particularly those in high-density areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"High attack rates at various time points","Impact":"Unmeasured cases and potential for outbreak resurgence","Mitigation":"Increase testing and surveillance, reinforce public health measures, and promote vaccine uptake","Technologies":"Testing technologies, surveillance systems, and vaccine distribution systems","People":"Unvaccinated individuals, vulnerable populations, and communities with low testing rates","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Association between non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) and transmission rates","Impact":"Effectiveness of NPIs in reducing transmission","Mitigation":"Evaluate and adjust NPI implementation, communicate NPI impact to the public, and enforce compliance","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools, communication platforms, and enforcement mechanisms","People":"General population, businesses, and community organizations","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers"}]}
